messages.id: Your site is up to date.
messages.defaultMessage: Your site is up to date.

messages.id: There was an error with the upgrade.
messages.defaultMessage: There was an error with the upgrade.

messages.id: More information about the upgrade procedure can be found in the documentation section of plone.org in the Upgrade Guide.
messages.defaultMessage: More information about the upgrade procedure can be found in the documentation section of plone.org in the Upgrade Guide.

messages.id: The site configuration is outdated and needs to be upgraded.
messages.defaultMessage: The site configuration is outdated and needs to be upgraded.

messages.id: The following list shows which upgrade steps are going to be run. Upgrading sometimes performs a catalog/security update, which may take a long time on large sites. Be patient.
messages.defaultMessage: The following list shows which upgrade steps are going to be run. Upgrading sometimes performs a catalog/security update, which may take a long time on large sites. Be patient.

messages.id: Please ensure you have a backup of your site before performing the upgrade.
messages.defaultMessage: Please ensure you have a backup of your site before performing the upgrade.
